text: Yaron Ben-Dov (11 January 1970 - 6 January 2017) was an Israeli footballer. He played for Ironi Rishon LeZion, Maccabi Netanya and Hapoel Tel Aviv. He was born in Netanya. Ben-Dov died after an illness on 6 January 2017 at the age of 46. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Jewish Israeli sportspeople Category:Israeli footballers
title: Yaron Ben-Dov
